ygData.subject: RE: Trading Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: agreed.  on all of our raids, only those who can use an item are in on the lotto.  now he could have traded to get mithril arms and legs, and mostl likely as
ygData.messageBody:
agreed. on all of our raids, only those who can use an item are in on the
lotto. now he could have traded to get mithril arms and legs, and mostl
likely as you said he had only bp and bracers. the question is, if he has
this stuff why not just use that on his bard instead of lambent? the bp's
are a toss-up, but the arms and legs kill lambent and would look better with
a mith bp anyway. i woulda liked to see exactly what the wiz had.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L35 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> > Mithril Breastplate = hella good
> > Mithril Bracers = ok. great for wisdom using casters.
> great trade item
>
> they arent that good. easy to acquire too.
>
>
> > Runed Mithril Tunic = good for wisdom using casters. ok trade item
>
> this isn't at all good for a bard. plus you aren't likely to see
> many of these.
>
>
> > Mithril Greaves = hella good
> > Mithril Vambraces = hella good
>
> huh????? I am willing to bet oh, about 5k pp that this wizard
> didn't intend on, nor had either of these to trade. Just a hunch.
> No wizard gets these items when raiding Tranix. That would be
> incredibly stupid.
>
> This wizard had one too many bracers from lucky randoms in the
> king room. And maybe a bp in the bank he wanted to get rid of
> so he could pick up another.
>
> Harm.
